TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableRow extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

span.span: Represents a row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 类表示控件中的行 。The class represents a row in a control. 此类允许您控制行的内容的显示方式。This class allows you to control how the contents of the row are displayed. 通过设置和属性来指定行中内容的对齐方式 。The alignment of the contents in the row are specified by setting the and properties. 您可以通过使用集合以编程方式管理行中的单元格 。You can programmatically manage the cells in the row by using the collection. 集合是 表示行中单元格的对象的集合。The collection is a collection of objects that represent the cells in the row. > [!CAUTION] > 控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意的客户端脚本。The control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 验证控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/debza5t0(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Validation Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/debza5t0(v=vs.100)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                   ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个表，以编程方式向表中添加元素，并在网页上显示该表。This following code example creates a table, programmatically adds elements to the table, and displays the table on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中的行的单元格。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the cells of a row in a control.

value.span: 对象，表示 控件的行的单元格集合。

span.span: A object that represents a collection of cells from a row of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以编程方式控制 对象的集合，这些对象表示来自控件行的单元格 。Use this property to programmatically control a collection of objects that represent the cells from a row of the control. 您可以通过编程方式添加、插入或删除 集合中的对象。You can programmatically add, insert, or remove a object from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅在 以编程方式生成控件时使用。This property is only used when building controls programmatically. 在设计时，通过声明对象设置此属性 。At design time, this property is set by declaring objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个表，以编程方式向表中添加元素，并在网页上显示该表。This following code example creates a table, programmatically adds elements to the table, and displays the table on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置行内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the contents in the row.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定行内容的水平对齐方式。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the contents of the row. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |水平对齐Horizontal Alignment|说明Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| ||未设置水平对齐方式。The horizontal alignment is not set.| ||该行的内容保持不齐。The contents of the row are left justified.| ||该行的内容处于中心位置。The contents of the row are centered.| ||该行的内容右对齐。The contents of the row are right justified.| ||该行的内容均匀地展开并与左右边距对齐。The contents of the row are uniformly spread out and aligned with both the left and right margins.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. 有关完整的工作代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[TableCell#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[TableCell#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于 4.0，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中 对象的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location for a object in a control.
A value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可获取或设置在 控件中放置对象的位置 。Use the property to get or set where the object is placed in a control. 有关可用的表位置，请参阅 。For the available table locations, see . 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |表行部分Table row section|显示为Displayed as| |-----------------------|------------------| ||标题行。The header row.| ||表的正文。The body of the table.| ||脚注行。The footer row.| 使用声明性语法时，部分必须按标题、正文和脚注的顺序排列。When using the declarative syntax, the sections must be in the order of header, body, and then footer. 枚举使你可以 通过将 `` 、 `` 和 `` 元素添加到呈现给客户端的 HTML 来使用控件生成可访问的网站。The enumeration enables you to build accessible Web sites using the control by adding the ``, ``, and `` elements to the HTML that is rendered to the client. 如果表中的所有行都在 `` 元素中，则不会呈现该部分的信息。If all rows in a table are in the `` element, the section information is not rendered. 在非主体元素中必须至少有一行。At least one row must be in a non-body element. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性定义控件中的表头行和表尾行 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to define header and footer rows in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableRow/CS/TableRowCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableRow/VB/TableRowVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The is not valid.

summary.span: 获取或设置行内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the contents in the row.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定行内容的垂直对齐方式。Use the property to specify the vertical alignment of the contents of the row. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |垂直对齐Vertical Alignment|说明Description| |------------------------|-----------------| ||不设置垂直对齐方式。The vertical alignment is not set.| ||该行的内容与行的顶部对齐。The contents of the row are aligned with the top of the row.| ||该行的内容与行的中间对齐。The contents of the row are aligned with the middle of the row.| ||该行的内容与行的底部对齐。The contents of the row are aligned with the bottom of the row.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. 有关完整的工作代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[TableCell#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[TableCell#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#4)]
